short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes websites appear in grayscale to promote calmness and reduce distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of being bombarded by colorful distractions while browsing the web? GrayZen is here to help! This extension converts all websites to grayscale, promoting a calmer and more focused browsing experience.

With GrayZen, you can customize the hours during which the extension is active, allowing you to set aside specific times for focused work or relaxation. You can also easily toggle the extension on and off as needed.

Say goodbye to mindless scrolling and hello to a more intentional browsing experience with GrayZen.
